title: Use Property Decorator
description: Create a Person class with age validation using property decorator
starterCode:
# Create Person with age property that validates (must be 0-120)

class Person:
    def __init__(self, name, age):
        self.name = name
        self._age = age
    
    # Add age property with validation

person = Person("Bob", 30)
print(person.age)
person.age = 35
print(person.age)
hints: Check if age is between 0 and 120
